name: (TBN)First Person Melee Bullet Hell
description:
What if 2D bullet hell game was first person? Prototype playtest for basic combat and enemy attack types.

Please feedback on the discord!

https://discord.gg/sgXe64EeBG

4 Enemy types

9 Unique Arenas

Controls:

  • Attack: LMB
  • Block: RMB
  • Switch Stance: Left Shift
  • Crouch/SlideDodge: Left CTRL

Mechanics:

-The player character has two stances that provide different buffs to the player.

--Defense: Decreased guard cost when blocking, increased knock-back resistance

--Speed: Increased movement speed, crouching while moving initiates a slide dodged

-Double Jump

--Ground jump can be held to leap higher, or tapped to bunny hop

--Air jump is static boost

-Blocking reduces your guard bar. When depleted your guard breaks and you cannot block until the guard bar has regenerated in full.
